title: Looking for a good ranked team.
body:
I'm wanting to join a ranked team in the preseason to practice alot to try make a climb in season 6.
I've had a little ranked team experience but not too much.

I'm a support main & would highly pref to support, but I can play all roles effectively.
I'm capable of shot calling if needed, have all types of voice coms, reliable net & I play alot.

I'm happy to join a couple of teams as I'm on alot, I don't mind what rank the team is aslong as it's good players that take it seriously and are looking to improve.
